title: Paper Targets: Art Can Be Murder
description: An Amazon top 100. Critics and reviewers called Paper Targets " Wonderfully written," "An astonishing novel," and "Flat-out genius."Enzi meets an enigmatic artist at a party. When he drives her home, she gives him a mysterious and damaged painting. Later, when she leaves a message that she has been arrested and is in jail, Enzi makes a mistake that has fatal consequences.Paper Targets is a wild ride of a story about gifted and flawed misfits. Both riveting and heartbreaking, with memorable characters encountered along the way, the novel is based on the true events of one of the world's largest criminal frauds and the far-reaching implications of love and greed. "This book is flat-out genius, the best novel Iâ€™ve read in years." - Martin Clark, best-selling Author of The Plinko Bounce.
author: Steve S. Saroff
